original: Kockum, Erik Frans Henriksson, direktör, bergsingenjör, Ronneby, f. 7/8/89 i Malmö av bergsing. Henrik K. o. Louise Plåten. G. 17 m. Greta Wijkander. Barn: Brita f. 18, g. m. civ :ing. G. Westrup, Västerås, Ella 20, fil. mag., g. m. gymnrdir. Curt Wahlberg, Sthlm, Lars 21, Berndit-Erilk 25, Frans-Jörgen 30. — Mogiex. i Malmö 08, avg:ex. fr. KTLI o. bergshögsk. 14. Studivist. i Tyskl. 14-15 o. i USA 16. Ing. v. Kallinge Jarnv. 17-20, dirtassLst. v. Kockums Jernv. A-B, verkst. dir. f. Kockums Förvaltn. A-B 20-25 o. f. Kockums Jernv. A-B .sed. 25. Styr:-led. i de båda sistn. bol. samt i Kockums Mek. Verkst. A-B o. Järnbruks-förb., fuHm. i Jernkont., ordf. i Blek. 1. skogsv :styr., Ronneby hamnstyr., lokaistyr. f. samrealsk., led. av stads-fullm., beredn :utsk. o. kristidsstyr. RNO, RVO.
translated: Kockum, Erik Frans Henriksson, director, mining engineer, Ronneby, b. 7/8/89 in Malmö, son of mining engineer Henrik K. and Louise Plåten. Married on 17 with Greta Wijkander. Children: Brita b. 18, married to civil engineer G. Westrup, Västerås, Ella 20, Master of Arts, married to gymnasium director Curt Wahlberg, Stockholm, Lars 21, Berndit-Erilk 25, Frans-Jörgen 30. Graduated from Malmö School of Mines in 1908, completed the course at KTLI and the Royal School of Mines in 1914. Studied in Germany from 1914-1915 and in the USA in 1916. Engineer at Kallinge Railway from 1917-1920, assistant director at Kockums Railway Company, managing director of Kockums Forvaltnings AB from 1920-1925, and managing director of Kockums Jernv.AB since 1925. Board member in both companies, as well as in Kockums Mek. Verkst. AB and Järnbruksförbundet. Member of the board at Jernkontoret, chairman of the board for Blekinge Provincial Forestry Committee, Ronneby port board, local board for secondary school, member of the city council, the committee on preparedness and the crisis management board. Recipient of the Order of the North Star and the Order of Vasa.
